thread.title: Browns Reportedly Will ‘Strongly Consider’ Trading For Jimmy Garoppolo
thread.title_full: Browns Reportedly Will ‘Strongly Consider’ Trading For Jimmy Garoppolo

author: CBS Boston
title: Browns Reportedly Will ‘Strongly Consider’ Trading For Jimmy Garoppolo
text:
Browns Reportedly Will ‘Strongly Consider’ Trading For Jimmy Garoppolo February 1, 2017 10:12 AM Filed Under: Cleveland Browns , Jimmy Garoppolo , NFL Rumors , Patriots Jimmy Garoppolo (Photo by Maddie Meyer/Getty Images) 
BOSTON (CBS) – While the Patriots are in Houston focused on Super Bowl LI, another NFL team is reportedly focusing its attention on a quarterback who will be on the New England sideline on Sunday. 
The Cleveland Plain Dealer reported that the Browns interest in trading for Jimmy Garoppolo is “real” and they will “strongly consider it.” 
Cleveland has the number one and 12 picks in the upcoming NFL Draft. The Plain Dealer speculates that the cost for the Patriots quarterback could be “the No. 12 overall pick and more.” 
The newspaper added that the Browns will likely have competition in a potential Garoppolo trade, listing San Francisco as another possible landing spot.
